datafield.subfield: Search for long-lived scalar particles in $B^+ \to K^+ \chi (\mu^+\mu^-)$ decays

Search for $CP$ violation in the phase space of $D^0\rightarrow\pi^+\pi^-\pi^+\pi^-$ decays
Observation of the decay $\Xi_b^- \to p K^-K^-$
Search for massive long-lived particles decaying semileptonically in the LHCb detector
Evidence for the two-body charmless baryonic decay $ {B}^{+}\to p\overline{\varLambda} $
Search for decays of neutral beauty mesons into four muons
Measurements of charm mixing and $C\!P$ violation using $D^0 \to K^\pm \pi^\mp$ decays
Measurement of the CKM angle $\gamma$ from a combination of LHCb results

Observation of the annihilation decay mode $B^{0}\to K^{+}K^{-}$

Search for Higgs-like bosons decaying into long-lived exotic particles
First experimental study of photon polarization in radiative $B^{0}_{s}$ decays

Measurement of the ratio of branching fractions $\mathcal{B}(B_{c}^{+} \to J/\psi K^{+})/\mathcal{B}(B_{c}^{+} \to J/\psi\pi^{+})$
Measurement of the forward Z boson production cross-section in pp collisions at $\sqrt{s} = 13$ TeV
Observation of $\eta_{c}(2S) \to p \bar p$ and search for $X(3872) \to p \bar p$ decays

Measurement of the $CP$ asymmetry in $B_s^0-\overline{B}{}_s^0$ mixing

Measurement of $C\!P$ observables in $B^\pm \rightarrow D K^\pm$ and $B^\pm \rightarrow D \pi^\pm$ with two- and four-body $D$ decays
Search for $B_c^+$ decays to the $p\bar p\pi^+$ final state

Study of D$_{sJ}^{(*)+}$ mesons decaying to D$^{+}$ K$_S^0$ and D$^{*0}$ K$^{+}$ final states
